name: Documents_GetTemplateDocuments
description: Retrieves a list of documents associated with the specified template.

accountId.description: The external account number (int) or account ID GUID.

$ul: **templateDocuments**: An array of document objects that contain information about the documents associated with the template.
**templateId**: The unique identifier of the template. If this is not provided, DocuSign will generate a value.

$block: This object describes errors that occur. It is only valid for responses and ignored in requests.

$ul: **errorCode**: The code associated with the error condition.
**message**: A brief message describing the error condition.
